capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Managing and coordinating the development, implementation, and evaluation of new digital functionalities within deadlines, quality standards, and budget.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Planning digital project delivery in an agile environment, ensuring efficient use of resources and alignment with strategic objectives.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Developing innovative digital solutions to enhance park visitor experiences and environmental programs.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Ensuring projects adhere to environmental safety, risk management policies, and legislative requirements.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Great communication and collaboration skills required for working with a diverse team and managing vendor and contract relationships.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Strong project management experience in an agile setting, including user research, UX design, and analytics.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Extensive digital skills and familiarity with software platforms and tools like Sitecore CMS, Smartsheet, and Azure DevOps.

capabilities.name: Procurement and Contract Management
capabilities.description: Understanding of best practices in procurement, tendering, and contract preparation for managing project teams and consultants.

skills.name: Agile Project Management
skills.description: Managing digital projects in an agile environment, ensuring adaptability and efficient delivery.

skills.name: Digital Communication Platforms
skills.description: Utilizing various digital tools and platforms for project management and delivery.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with internal and external stakeholders, including vendors and consultants, to ensure project success.

skills.name: Environmental Policy Compliance
skills.description: Applying environmental safety and risk management policies in project execution.

generalRole.title: Digital Project Management in Environmental Conservation
generalRole.description: This role involves leading digital project delivery within an environmental conservation context, utilizing advanced project management and technology skills to enhance visitor experiences and support environmental programs.
